name: Dark Fullscreen Salty Bet
description:
A more compact version of Salty Bet that moves the bets over to the same column as the chat. This is meant to be used in 16:9 or 16:10 aspect ratio with the browser fullscreen (F11).

If the theme fit the window properly the first time, try disabling it in and re-enabling it via the Stylish button.
additional_info:
I didn't like how much extra space the default layout took so I spent a while modifying it to look better. I started off wanting to make this a small player so I could put it in a small corner of my monitor while I'm working. I'll be sure to link that once it's uploaded. 

I'm currently running it on a 1920x1080 tv and a 1680x1050 monitor and I think it looks great and a little more organized.
I would suggest the Dark Twitch chat that is already available thanks to SirFist. This will pretty much reverse the chat colors to fit the dark theme.

https://userstyles.org/styles/78830/twitch-tv-dark-black-customisable-theme

I would also suggest SaltyBet+ (only works for Illuminati) as it will show the stats in the bottom right hand corner as well.

https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/saltybet%20/kecciaioaghjcldgoonciaahfedkoafc?hl=en-GB

Also, here's a link to the small player I was talking about. https://userstyles.org/styles/103805/discreet-salty-bets


I'll try to keep this updated in case I do other versions.
